People want to leave, but getting out is risky. Talks have failed to produce a recognised humanitarian corridor out of Mariupol, such as now exists in around nine other places https://t.co/qpdmme0pmi

Talks have failed to produce a recognised humanitarian corridor out of Mariupol. Some people are leaving any way they can, often under artillery fire. But the most dangerous escape routes are becoming even more deadly
